email.subject: Diary
email.body:
This is it
Finally I can get to him and extract all I need to find him
Though I lost everything I've got Only one thing is left Is to kill that motherfucker...
For Clara For justice For myself...
That OSequencer.exe is key to find his true battlestation And it will redirect me to it I just have to get in before he reacts
GOAL: ACTIVATE OSequencer.exe and extract netcfgx.dll of Omicron's PC
